content: the ends in the back of the work slip_stitch in next st fasten_off leaving a tail edging for the left wing single_crochet on the right side starting at the top piece leave a long tail for sewing the wing onto the body 9 for the right wing single_crochet on the left side starting at the bottom piece leave a long tail at the beginning for sewing the wing onto the body r1 make a slipknot and single_crochet about 10 sts along the edge fasten_off sew the wing onto the side of the body weave in the end in the back of the work 10 feet make 2 with orange yarn r1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring slip_stitch in next st fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing sew feet onto the body blush make 2 cut out blush template in pink felt with pink embroidery thread sew on the blush under the outer corner of the eyes 11 © adorably kawaii pattern is for personal use only please don t redistribute/resell the pattern in any way or form if you post the finished items you make online my only request is that say something like pattern designed by adorably kawaii - www adorablykawaii com email adorablykawaii@gmail com website http //www adorablykawaii com 12
